analysis.key_quote: Our ability to compete with other countries will be severely reduced by the diminishment of the NSF and NIH and the replacement of scientists with political appointees.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the replacement of scientists with political appointees, indicating a fear of politicization in scientific institutions, which opposes the proposed rule. Additionally, it emphasizes the importance of expertise over ideological loyalty, aligning with concerns about scientific integrity.
